venue.name: Rabb Auditorium at Boston Public Library in Copley Square

item.description:
Hemingway and Pamplona

Yolanda Barcina, mayor of Pamplona, and Allen Josephs, a Hemingway scholar, will lead a lively conversation with a panel of invited guests. Susan Wrynn, curator of the Hemingway collection at the JFK Presidential Library, will highlight the holdings there, and Bruce Rettman of the Boston Writing Project will share strategies for teaching Hemingway to todayâ€™s high school students. A reception and tasting of the wines of Navarra will follow.

Location: Rabb Hall
item.how_to_find_us: I will be in Reno. Ad hoc organizer needed.
item.name: Hemingway & Pamplona
